cms.query.QueryText:
-- ChatMessageLastModified has to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
UPDATE Chat_Message SET [ChatMessageCreatedWhen] = @ChatMessageCreatedWhen, [ChatMessageIPAddress] = @ChatMessageIPAddress, [ChatMessageUserID] = @ChatMessageUserID, [ChatMessageRoomID] = @ChatMessageRoomID, [ChatMessageRejected] = @ChatMessageRejected, [ChatMessageLastModified] = GETDATE(), [ChatMessageText] = @ChatMessageText, [ChatMessageSystemMessageType] = @ChatMessageSystemMessageType, [ChatMessageRecipientID] = @ChatMessageRecipientID WHERE [ChatMessageID] = @ChatMessageID
